entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Powell River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Powell River Airport 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 early in the afternoon except gusting to 80 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
